/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of white, gray, and brown, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The sky itself is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
